title: Ultra-Rare McLaren Speedtail Heads To Auction With $250k In Options
description: McLaren’s Ultimate Series of models represent the pinnacle of the brand’s technological, performance, and design expertise. descriptionSummary: McLaren's flagship Ultimate Series showcases the brand's mastery of innovative engineering, exceptional performance, and sleek design. The W1 marks its latest achievement, building on the success of earlier models like the groundbreaking Speedtail triathlete, a powerhouse with unparalleled capabilities.

title: Tesla Won’t Like New Sales Figures in Challenging European Countries
description: Tesla registrations fell in several significant European countries during July, including France, Denmark, and Sweden, for the seventh consecutive month. The electric automaker registered 1,307 new vehicles in France during July, down 27% year-over-year. In Denmark, Tesla sold 336 cars, ...
titleSummary: Tesla Faces Reality Check in Troubled EU Markets
descriptionSummary: Electric car registrations dipped sharply in key European markets like France, Denmark, and Sweden last July, marking the seventh consecutive monthly decline. Notably, French sales plummeted by a quarter to just over 1,300 units.

titleSummary: "Meet the Masters of Analog Revival: Restoring Porsche's Pure Driving Soul"

title: Ford Maverick Crushing Hyundai Santa Cruz In Sales This Year

titleSummary: "Lucid's Electric Muscle Car Smashes Quarter-Mile Record, Leaving Supercar Titans in Dust"
descriptionSummary: The Lucid Gravity Dream Edition SUV has made a scorching impression on the quarter-mile track, eclipsing several high-performance rivals with a record-breaking 10.6-second time at 140 mph. Its speed is truly electrifying.

title: Before the G63, There Was This Oddball AMG G-Wagon
description: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class wasn’t born out of luxury. Originally developed in the late 1970s for military use – most notably for the Shah of Iran – the Geländewagen was built to be durable, functional, and capable off-road. Political turmoil scrapped the original plan, but Mercedes chose ...
titleSummary: "Unlikely Ancestor of the G63: A Quirky Predecessor Emerges"
descriptionSummary: The iconic G-Class emerged from a utilitarian past, born in the 1970s as a rugged military vehicle designed for harsh terrain, including for the Shah of Iran's elite forces. Its durability and functionality paved the way for a luxury renaissance.

title: 2026 Grand Highlander Arrives, But 2025 Offers Better Value
description: Since arriving in 2023, the Toyota Grand Highlander has secured its place in the brand's US lineup as a family-focused, three-row SUV positioned above the regular Highlander. Built in Indiana and based on the TNGA-K platform, it offers more interior room, a usable third row, and multiple powertrain ...
titleSummary: New Arrival Outshone by its Predecessor in Terms of Price and Performance
descriptionSummary: The 2023 Toyota Grand Highlander is a versatile, three-row SUV that has quickly become a stalwart in the brand's US lineup. Its spacious design and various engine options cater to families' needs for comfort and capability.

title: Hyundai Ioniq 5 and Honda Prologue Break EV Sales Records in July
description: July was a huge month for electric vehicles in the U.S., and two standout models helped lead the way: the Hyundai Ioniq 5 and the Honda Prologue. Both compact electric SUVs posted their best-ever July sales, pushing their brands to new overall sales records and setting the tone for what could be a ...

descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle sales in the US reached unprecedented heights in July, with the Hyundai Ioniq 5 and Honda Prologue leading the charge as top sellers. Both compact SUVs set individual monthly records, driving their respective brands to historic highs.

description: Lamborghini's shift toward electrified supercars continues with the introduction of the Temerario, the Italian marque's all-new plug-in hybrid coupe. Underpinning this bold new chapter is a game-changing powertrain that eclipses the outgoing V10 engine in terms of potency and efficiency.

title: MIT’s Light-Only AI Chip Could Supercharge Electric Vehicles
description: Imagine an EV that doesn’t need a bulky cooling system for its brain. Imagine your car processing LiDAR data, high-res camera feeds, and driver monitoring in real time—without sipping a ton of juice from the battery. MIT’s new light-only AI chip, which swaps electrons for photons, might just pull ...

descriptionSummary: Meet a groundbreaking EV innovation: a revolutionary AI chip that harnesses light to process high-speed data, eliminating the need for bulky cooling systems and significantly boosting efficiency in advanced driving features.

title: Ford Bronco 60th Anniversary Edition Blends Past and Present
description: Introduced on August 11, 1965, as a 1966 model, the Ford Bronco was designed to bring the simplicity and excitement of the Mustang into a rugged, off-road-ready vehicle. titleSummary: Bronco at 60: Vintage Flair Meets Modern Muscle in Special Edition Model
descriptionSummary: Ford revolutionized the automotive landscape with the 1966 Bronco, blending the youthful energy of the Mustang with the capability to conquer rugged terrain, thereby pioneering the sport utility vehicle category in American car culture.

description: Honda’s Anna Engine Plant (AEP) celebrated 40 years of building engines and components for both foreign and domestic production on July 22nd. descriptionSummary: Honda's Anna Engine Plant marks four decades of engine manufacturing, having transformed from a modest site with 200,000 square feet and 94 staff in 1985 into a sprawling operation serving both domestic and international markets.

title: G-Power's Thousand-Horsepower BMW XM Copies Mansory's Homework

descriptionSummary: The BMW XM presents a paradox: it's both an SUV and an M car, defying expectations. Its unusual design makes it a challenge for the aftermarket to create accessories without opting for a full vehicle transformation.

title: Ford Revises Tariff Hit Estimate Again - And It’s Not Pretty

descriptionSummary: Ford has revised its financial outlook for 2025, citing a significant impact from tariffs on profits. Tariff-related costs jumped 20% to $3 billion, with $800 million incurred in the previous quarter alone. EBIT is expected to be $6.5 billion.

title: 2026 Chevrolet Colorado Updates Are Coming – But Should You Buy the 2025 Instead?

descriptionSummary: For 2025, Chevrolet streamlined the Colorado lineup by standardizing its engine across all trims, eliminating previous distinctions between trim levels and creating a more cohesive and user-friendly model lineup.

title: Hybrids vs EVs vs ICE: Which Car Actually Pollutes the Most?

title: Volkswagen Won't Like The Hyundai Ioniq 5's Charging Speed
description: An EV's charging speed can tip the scales one way or the other, especially if you enjoy family road trips.
